name: ByteRover Milestone Planning
description: Define project milestones with goals, scoped requirements, phased roadmaps, and implementation decisions
long_description: A structured workflow for defining what to build next. Gathers goals through user conversation, scopes requirements with REQ-IDs for traceability, derives a phased roadmap using goal-backward analysis, and optionally captures implementation decisions for gray areas. Stores everything in the knowledge base via brv curate for downstream planning and execution.
